Item ID4699

Lava runes are combination runes that count as two separate runes: one fire rune and one earth rune. Thus, any spell requiring one fire rune, one earth rune, or both will spend only one lava rune.

They can be created with the Runecraft skill or purchased with Pizazz points from the Mage Training Arena.

10 lava runes and 10 mist runes are required for the completion of Swan Song. In addition, crafting lava runes at the Fire Altar is a medium task in the Lumbridge & Draynor Diary.

When equipped, the lava battlestaff and mystic lava staff provide an unlimited number of lava runes.

Contents

  • 1 Runecraft info
    • 1.1 Earth Altar

Runecraft info[edit | edit source]

At 23 Runecraft or higher, they can be crafted in either of two ways:

  • Bringing pure essence, fire runes, and a fire talisman to the Earth Altar (for 10.0 Runecraft xp per rune)
  • Bringing pure essence, earth runes, and an earth talisman to the Fire Altar (for 10.5 Runecraft xp per rune)

You may wear a tiara to enter and use the altar, but the other element must be a talisman when crafting combination runes. Clicking on the altar or using a pure essence on it will produce normal runes. To prevent creating the wrong runes, make sure you are using the complementary rune on the altar. For example, at the Fire Altar use the earth runes on the altar.

Combinations have a 50% success rate (or 100%, if the player is wearing a binding necklace), and the talisman is consumed in the process (unless the player uses the Lunar spell Magic Imbue). The elemental talisman will also not work in place of talismans when crafting the runes.

Thus, any spell requiring one fire rune, one earth rune, or both will spend only one lava rune. They can be created with the [[Runecraft]] skill or purchased with [[Pizazz points]] from the [[Mage Training Arena]]. 10 lava runes and 10 [[mist rune]]s are required for the completion of [[Swan Song]]. In addition, crafting lava runes at the [[Fire Altar]] is a [[Lumbridge & Draynor Diary#Medium|medium task]] in the [[Lumbridge & Draynor Diary]]. When equipped, the [[lava battlestaff]] and [[mystic lava staff]] provide an unlimited number of lava runes. ==Runecraft info== At {{SCP|Runecraft|23|link=yes}} or higher, they can be crafted in either of two ways: * Bringing [[pure essence]], [[fire rune]]s, and a [[fire talisman]] to the [[Earth Altar]] (for 10.0 Runecraft xp per rune) * Bringing pure essence, [[earth rune]]s, and an [[earth talisman]] to the [[Fire Altar]] (for 10.5 Runecraft xp per rune) You may wear a [[Tiara (disambiguation)|tiara]] to enter and use the altar, but the other element '''must''' be a [[talisman]] when crafting combination runes. Clicking on the altar or using a pure essence on it will produce normal runes. To prevent creating the wrong runes, make sure you are using the complementary rune on the altar. For example, at the Fire Altar use the earth runes on the altar. Combinations have a 50% success rate (or 100%, if the player is wearing a [[binding necklace]]), and the talisman is consumed in the process (unless the player uses the [[Lunar spellbook|Lunar spell]] [[Magic Imbue]]). The [[elemental talisman]] will also '''not''' work in place of talismans when crafting the runes. ===Earth Altar=== {{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 23 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 10 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Earth Altar |tools = Earth tiara, Binding necklace, Magic Imbue |mat1 = Pure essence |mat1quantity = 26 |mat2 = Fire rune |mat2quantity = 26 |mat3 = Fire talisman |mat3itemnote = Not needed when using [[Magic Imbue]]. |output1 = Lava rune |output1quantity = 13 |output1quantitynote = 50% chance of success per essence, or
